taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Heliantheae;subtribe Chaenactidinae;genus Chaenactis;species macrantha;

bio:treatment.discussion: Though the derived floral features of Chaenactis macrantha obscure its relationships, it may represent a link between sect. Chaenactis (annuals; pappus scales in regular, often strongly reduced series) and sect. Macrocarphus (leaf blades gland-dotted). Resemblance of its heads, leaves, and indument to those of C. thompsonii and relatives is striking. It appears to form no natural hybrids, perhaps because of its nocturnal corollas.
